nodes.text: Nevid d'Hon was an Avogwi starship outfitter who worked on Ord Mantell during the Galactic Civil War. Mama suggested d'Hon to Han Solo as a possible source of information regarding the kidnapping of Leia Organa by the bounty hunter Alfreda Goot.

d'Hon was destroyed by the Columi brothers, Craitheus and Marvid Qreph as revenge for the shooting of their mother. They did not know if d'Hon had perpetrated the act. Believing that it was possible that d'Hon had killed Mama due to her association with Han Solo, the Qreph brothers crushed d'Hon by destroying his life and personal relationships to make sure that their mother had been avenged.
